products.name: DENEFIS® ANTI-ACNE AND BLACK SPOT PURIFIER DEEP CLEANING FOAMING GEL WITH SALICYLIC ACID
products.keyBenefits: DENEFIS® Deep Facial Cleansing Foaming Gel helps to cleanse the skin and prevent blackhead formation at the maximum level, and can support reducing the oily appearance by balancing the sebum status on the skin thanks to the 1% Salicylic acid and 1% Hamamelis Virginia Extract it contains.
products.description: Deep cleansing foaming gel that reduces black spots and oily skin.
products.howToUse: Suitable for Daily use. You can use it 2 times a day in the morning and evening routines. Wet your skin with water before using the product. Then apply a sufficient amount of product to your skin by gently massaging it in a circular motion. Rinse your skin with plenty of water after application.

products.name: DENEFIS® VITAMIN-C SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Brightening Vitamin C Serum, in addition to its anti-blemish properties, helps your skin to appear bright and long-lasting. It helps to even out skin tone and brighten the skin. Vitamin C’s antioxidant properties help protect the skin from environmental factors that it is exposed to throughout the day. It helps to reduce the dull and lifeless appearance of the skin due to Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide). It aids in achieving a uniform skin tone and appearance.
products.description: Brightening vitamin-C serum that evens out skin tone and protects from environmental damage.
products.howToUse: Apply a few drops of serum to your face twice a day, after cleansing, until absorbed. For daytime use, it is advised to pair it with SPF 50 sunscreen cream.

It helps to renew the hair by nourishing and strengthening it from root to tip.
products.description: Hair care spray that promotes hair renewal and strength using herbal stem cells and nourishing ingredients.
products.howToUse: Shake the bottle well before use. Spray the product by massaging the wet or dry hair roots. Do not wash your hair for 3 hours after application. Use at least 2 months to see effectiveness.

products.name: DENEFIS® RETINOL SERUM
products.keyBenefits: Retinol helps increase skin cell production (proliferation). It helps to open clogged pores. Retinol also exfoliates your skin and aids in collagen production, which can reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, giving your skin a fresher, plumper appearance.
products.description: Rejuvenating retinol serum that promotes cell renewal, unclogs pores, and reduces fine lines for a plumper skin.
products.howToUse: Apply to clean skin. Massage into the skin every day regularly before going to bed at night. Use regularly for at least 3 months. Avoid contact with eyes.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Use regularly for at least 3 months.

When caffeine is applied to the skin, it can increase blood circulation on the skin surface, which can help the skin look more vibrant and fresh.

products.name: DENEFIS® COLLAGEN SERUM
products.keyBenefits: The amount of collagen and elastin in your skin determines how supple, soft, and tight it is. Collagen and elastin levels decline with age. As a result, your skin loses elasticity, smoothness, and firmness. Its content of hyaluronic acid, collagen, and peptides helps to reduce the appearance of wrinkles caused by dryness, while also assisting the skin in regaining a radiant appearance due to collagen and elastin loss. It destroys the dull and lifeless appearance of the skin, allowing it to have a homogeneous skin appearance and a bright tone, thanks to Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide).
products.description: Anti-wrinkle and skin lifting serum that boosts collagen and elastin levels, improving skin elasticity, smoothness, and brightness.
products.howToUse: Apply a few drops of serum to your face twice a day, after cleansing, until absorbed. For best results, use regularly for three months.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Use regularly for three months for best results.
products.doNotUseWith: Salicylic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, Vitamin C
products.activeContent: Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen, Peptides, Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide)
products.contents: Hyaluronic Acid, Collagen, Peptides, Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide)

products.name: DENEFIS® AHA+BHA SERUM
products.keyBenefits: With its AHA content, a special spot peeling serum that provides support against regional skin blemishes helps to purify the skin. It promotes self-renewal, protection, and revitalization of the skin. Its salicylic acid content helps to prevent the formation of acne by maintaining the skin’s serum balance.
products.description: This regenerating face serum with 10% AHA and 2% BHA supports skin purification, self-renewal, and acne prevention by maintaining sebum balance.
products.howToUse: Apply a small amount to the inside of your arm and test before use. Massage into clean skin every evening, avoiding the eyes. For daytime, use with SPF 50 sunscreen.
products.timeOfUse: Evening for daily use; daytime use with sunscreen recommended.
products.recommendedUsageDuration: Use regularly for best results; consult product guidelines.
